Personal Nature.quote: God created mankind in his own image, in the image of God he created them. (Genesis 1:27)

Divine Consciousness.quote: Krishna is the supreme conscious entity, the ultimate person. (Brahma Samhita 5.1)

Incarnation.quote: The Word became flesh and made his dwelling among us. (John 1:14)

Divine Will.quote: Not my will, but yours be done. (Luke 22:42)

Divine Intelligence.quote: How profound are your thoughts, O God! How vast is the sum of them! (Psalm 139:17)

Divine Emotions.quote: The Lord, the compassionate and gracious God, slow to anger, abounding in love and faithfulness. (Exodus 34:6)

Divine Communication.quote: And God said, 'Let there be light,' and there was light. (Genesis 1:3)

Divine Relationship.quote: I am my beloved's and my beloved is mine. (Song of Solomon 6:3)

Divine Presence.quote: Where can I go from your Spirit? Where can I flee from your presence? (Psalm 139:7)

Divine Agency.quote: For it is God who works in you to will and to act in order to fulfill his good purpose. (Philippians 2:13)

Divine Memory.quote: I will remember my covenant between me and you and all living creatures. (Genesis 9:15)

Divine Knowledge.quote: O Lord, you have searched me and you know me. (Psalm 139:1)

Divine Choice.quote: I have chosen you out of the world. (John 15:19)

Divine Voice.quote: Today, if you hear his voice, do not harden your hearts. (Hebrews 3:15)

Divine Face.quote: The Lord make His face shine upon you, and be gracious to you. (Numbers 6:25)

Divine Heart.quote: I have found David son of Jesse, a man after my own heart. (Acts 13:22)

Divine Mind.quote: For who has known the mind of the Lord? (Romans 11:34)

Divine Spirit.quote: The Spirit of God was hovering over the waters. (Genesis 1:2)

Divine Body.quote: In Christ all the fullness of the Deity lives in bodily form. (Colossians 2:9)

Divine Character.quote: God is light; in him there is no darkness at all. (1 John 1:5)

Divine Expression.quote: The heavens declare the glory of God. (Psalm 19:1)

Divine Intention.quote: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord. (Jeremiah 29:11)

Divine Personality.quote: I am the good shepherd. I know my sheep and my sheep know me. (John 10:14)

Divine Immanence.quote: God is within her, she will not fall; God will help her at break of day. (Psalm 46:5)

Divine Transcendence.quote: For thus says the High and Lofty One who inhabits eternity, whose name is Holy: 'I dwell in the high and holy place, and also with him who is of a contrite and lowly spirit.' (Isaiah 57:15)

Divine Incarnation.quote: The Word became flesh and dwelt among us. (John 1:14)

Divine Love.quote: God is love; whoever abides in love abides in God, and God in him. (1 John 4:16)

Divine Compassion.quote: The Lord is compassionate and gracious, slow to anger, abounding in love. (Psalm 103:8)

Divine Wisdom.quote: The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom, and knowledge of the Holy One is understanding. (Proverbs 9:10)

Divine Justice.quote: The Lord is a God of justice. (Isaiah 30:18)

Divine Mercy.quote: But you, O Lord, are a compassionate and gracious God, slow to anger, abounding in love and faithfulness. (Psalm 86:15)

Divine Grace.quote: For it is by grace you have been saved, through faith—and this is not from yourselves, it is the gift of God. (Ephesians 2:8)

Divine Holiness.quote: Be holy, because I am holy. (1 Peter 1:16)

Divine Sovereignty.quote: Yours, O Lord, is the greatness and the power and the glory and the victory and the majesty, for all that is in the heavens and the earth is yours. Yours is the kingdom, O Lord, and you are exalted as head above all. (1 Chronicles 29:11)

Divine Providence.quote: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose. (Romans 8:28)

Divine Omnipresence.quote: Where can I go from your Spirit? Where can I flee from your presence? If I go up to the heavens, you are there; if I make my bed in the depths, you are there. (Psalm 139:7-8)

Divine Omniscience.quote: How precious to me are your thoughts, O God! How vast is the sum of them! Were I to count them, they would outnumber the grains of sand— when I awake, I am still with you. (Psalm 139:17-18)

Divine Omnipotence.quote: For with God nothing shall be impossible. (Luke 1:37)

Divine Relationship with Humanity.quote: Abandon all dharmas and take refuge in Me alone. (Bhagavad Gita 18:66)

Divine Manifestation.quote: Whenever righteousness declines, I manifest Myself. (Bhagavad Gita 4:7)

Divine Unity.quote: Hear, O Israel: The Lord our God, the Lord is one. (Deuteronomy 6:4)
